SEC. 7. COURT AUTHORITY TO PROHIBIT OFFERINGS OF NONCOVERED SECURITIES. Section 21(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 is amended to give courts the authority to prohibit individuals from participating in the offering of noncovered securities if they violated section 10(b) or related regulations.
